stateDiagram-v2
    [IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker] --> ChallengeRequested: User initiates login

    ChallengeRequested --> ChallengeGenerated: Generate challenge
    ChallengeGenerated --> ChallengeExpired: TTL expires (IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
    ChallengeExpired --> [IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]: Challenge invalid

    ChallengeGenerated --> SignatureCreated: User signs challenge
    SignatureCreated --> SignatureVerified: Backend verifies
    SignatureCreated --> VerificationFailed: Invalid signature
    VerificationFailed --> [IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]: Authentication failed

    SignatureVerified --> TokenGenerated: Create JWT
    TokenGenerated --> SessionCreated: Create session
    SessionCreated --> TokenActive: Token in use

    TokenActive --> TokenUsed: API request
    TokenUsed --> TokenActive: Update activity
    TokenActive --> TokenRefreshed: Refresh request
    TokenRefreshed --> NewTokenGenerated: Generate new token
    NewTokenGenerated --> TokenActive: Continue session

    TokenActive --> TokenExpired: 24h TTL
    TokenExpired --> TokenRefreshed: Auto-refresh
    TokenExpired --> SessionExpired: No refresh
    SessionExpired --> [IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]: Requires re-authentication

    TokenActive --> TokenRevoked: User logout
    TokenRevoked --> SessionTerminated: Clear session
    SessionTerminated --> [IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]: Logged out

    TokenActive --> SessionRevoked: Admin action
    SessionRevoked --> [IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]: Force logout

    note right of ChallengeGenerated
        Challenge stored with:
        - 5 minute TTL
        - Unique nonce
        - Pubkey binding
    end note

    note right of TokenActive
        Token contains:
        - NOSTR pubkey
        - Session ID
        - Role (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
        - Issue/Expiry times
    end note

    note right of TokenRefreshed
        Refresh maintains:
        - Same session
        - Updated timestamps
        - Activity tracking
    end note
